excerpt: "Over in the US, Shamaine Daniels, a Democrat running for Congress in Pennsylvania, has employed Ashley, an AI-powered robocaller touted by her creators as the first political phone banker. These are just some of the instances illustrating the growing footprint of AI technologies in political strategies."
